# 🌞 Solaris Project  

<div align="center">
  <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Solaris Logo" width="100"/>  
  <p><em>A Java-based ecommerce platform application.</em></p>

---

## 📖 **Description**  
This repository contains the **source code (`src` files)** for the **Solaris Project**, a Java-based application.  
🚨 **Note:** This project does **not** include static data (images, configs, datasets). You must provide these separately.  

---

## 🛠 **Requirements**  
- **Java JDK 8+**  
- [Other tools/dependencies (e.g., Maven, Gradle)]  

---

## 🚀 **Setup Instructions**  

### **1. Clone the Repository**  
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/solaris-project.git

```

### **2. Provide Required Resources**
⚠ This project only includes src files.
You must supply:

Images (name them as needed)

Config files (if any)

Datasets (if applicable)

### **🎨 Customization**
You can freely:

✏ Modify Java source files

🖼 Add your own static data

⚙ Adjust configurations
